1.content:
You are a dairy farmer who makes a living by selling milk and cheese. You like it. It's simple, peaceful, and keeps you occupied. It is about 2 miles from the main road. You step into the kitchen and grab a glass of orange juice. your german shepherd gets up and licks your hand. you pet her back. "hey Jewel, how is my little girl doing?". she yipps and goes outside. you need to go feed Daisy, your jersey cow. you walk outside. someone pulls up in a white van with a logo on its side. it reads,"Fruitful Agricultural Feed Co."

Great, more advertisers.

whatever he is selling, your not buying. you walk to your barn.
"sir! excuse me, sir!" he begins to run.
ughh...
"howdy!" you say.
"hello sir! I'm here to share with you an experimental food supplement that boosts milk productions."
"oh really? What's the catch?"
"No catch! just feed one cow half a bag, no more, of this here food and see results in hours!
"Well that's fine and all, but how does it work?"
"Thanks to our patented tech, food is absorbed directly into the blood and its cells. This will cause the cow's body to grow 1.25 times larger! Now i must warn you, this may fatal to humans. So dont eat it. It is fine if other animals eat it, but they will grow as well, So please be careful when storing it. Feeding more than half a bag may prove fatal. We highly recomend not to try. Are you ready to see The money startrollin' in?
"I suppose..."
"splendid! I just need you to fill out these papers..."
"sure thing. got a pen?"
"Right here."
----------------------------------------------------------------
You now have 5 bags you need to store. where should they go?
1.title: Start!

11.content: You pack the bags inside and put them In a neat pile. You wonder why you were their test subject. Why not someone else? Oh well. Free feed for your cows. Now what?
11.title: The house.

111.content:
The man said "Could" be fatal, so why not try a bit? You stick your tongue out and try a bit.
It tasted rather sweet. You try a bit more...
Suddenly, you feel dizzy. everything is blurry.
111.title: ...Sneek a bite.

1111.content:
You try to stay awake, but everything gets worse.
your body freezes,
your heart stops.
1111.title: Try to stay awake!

1112.content:
You fall over and sleep comes fast.

==========================

You wake with a headache. You rise to your feet.
You are greeted with your house, but everything is huge! You are in a panic. slowly you calm down, and realize what an opportunity this is! You are an inch tall, and that is dangerous, so you should look for help.
1112.title: Pass out.

11121.content: You step out on the porch and wait for another advertiser to pull up. you hear a rumble. it's the same van! You can't miss this chance!
11121.title: Wait for advertiser.

111211.content: you run to meet him! He doesn't see you! His massive shoe crushes you into the dirt.
111211.title: Run to meet him!

111212.content:
You wave your arms and try to get his attention! Miraculously, he sees you and runs over!
"Damn it! I told you not to eat it!" he exclaims. "Here, drink this."

you drink it and grow to normal size.
111212.title: Wave your arms!

11122.content: You think about how cool it would be to see your cow, Daisy! It takes a while to get to the barn, and you are in the middle of your drive way. You notice your shed is on the way. Maybe you could check it out.
11122.title: Go to the barn.

111221.content:
You slowly make your way to the barn. The barn is rather easy to enter, since its walls are a few inches off the ground. Upon entering, you are greeted by a very foul smell, the smell of cow feed and cow patties. The floor is mostly dirt and straw, with a spot of mud here and there.
You note that all of your cows are out grazing in the field... except for Daisy. To the left is a horse stall, containing a horse that a friend brought over for you to look after. You can't recall anything else about the horse...

Daisy lets out a loud *Moo*.
111221.title: Continue to the barn.

1112211.content: You step into Daisy's stall, gasping at the sheer mass of the cow. She stands 50 times taller than you are. this is incredible! You stare at Daisy. She is eating some straw, her maw crushing and grinding it to a pulp before pulling it into her gigantic stomach. Your eyes stray towards her rear. Her udders dangle and sway to and fro. She flicks her tail to brush away some flies, exposing her gigantic anus, one that could swallow you whole if you were to fall in it. You start to walk toward...
1112211.title: Daisy's stall.

11122111.content: You aren't sure why, but you decide to approach her from the rear. You are at the base of her tall legs. You look up and stare in awe at the massive, bouncing udders, and her gasping vulva. You get ready to climb her leg. Before you approach further, you think about how high you should climb.
11122111.title: ...her backside.

111222.content: You go inside the shed, and find a bunch of boxes. There might be something in here that's useful. You walk up to a box and climb up on top of it.
111222.title: Check out the shed.

1112221.content: You search through the bottom boxes, but you hear a squeaking sound. Suddenly, you are face to face with a massive rat! you turn around to run, but the rat bites you. With a few gulps, you are rat food.
1112221.title: Look through the bottom boxes.

1112222.content:
You scale the boxes to arrive at a chest with a lock. With your small hands, you are able to pop the lock. inside is a note, a green vile, and a red vile. It reads, "Green ends all suffering, and red gives you your old problems. chose wisely."
which do you drink?
1112222.title: Climb up the boxes.

11122221.content: you drink the green vile, and it worked! your suffering has ended, at the cost of your life.
11122221.title: Green

11122222.content:
Once again, you feel dizzy, and you pass out swiftly.
You wake up at the sound of falling boxes. You look around, and everything is normal!
You wonder, did you have a dream? Was it real? It doesn't matter, though.
The end


You are back to normal.
11122222.title: Red

113.content: You yawn and look at your watch. 8:30. And you have church tomorrow at 6: 00 in the morning. You should sleep, especially when you got up at 5:30 A.M. to check you wild animal traps(nothing in them).
113.title: It's late. Better sleep.

info.brief_description: A salesman gives you a product to boost a cow's milk production, but it takes a turn...
info.description:
Please add if you will follow these guide lines:

*Use Proper Grammar! Spelling, capitals, punctuation, and "" quotations for speech.
*Paragraphs are Appreciated!
*Write long chapters. No "One liners".(Unless it is an 'other' choice)
*No furries or anthros. I like them, but they aren't wanted here.
*space out your writing for ease of reading

I will edit minor mistakes, but if it doesn't follow the guide lines, i will remove it. don't worry, i'm not strict

have fun, explore, and please add!
info.pretty_title: Shrunk/ animal growth on a farm
